attributes.action: Current Tuition Fees to be Lowered?
attributes.additional_details: Do you think the current tuition fees are too high? This e-petition is about the current tuition fees in the UK and how it is too high for people who arent as rich as others. By signing this e-petition we could be able to allow politicians to debate whether tuition fees should be lowered from £9000 to either £6000 or £3000.
